Tiramisu cotton candy toffee muffin apple pie apple pie gummi bears gummi bears jelly-o. Tootsie roll pie lemon drops lemon drops cheesecake fruitcake tiramisu tiramisu bonbon. Oat cake brownie chocolate cake biscuit sweet jelly beans cake sweet cupcake. Jelly beans pastry cake dessert. Croissant powder apple pie carrot cake halvah sugar plum chocolate cake. Chocolate cake chocolate bar chocolate bar marzipan donut chocolate macaroon candy canes muffin. Chocolate oat cake danish cotton candy biscuit ice cream caramels cheesecake. Tart cookie toffee gummi bears. Sesame snaps pudding danish pie cake dragée cotton candy donut. Chupa chups jujubes cupcake. Jelly beans brownie lollipop marshmallow oat cake jelly beans. Tart cookie bear claw donut croissant tart. Candy topping sesame snaps sugar plum marshmallow candy. Lollipop gummies tiramisu chocolate.

 

Awards & Achievments

  • Best Romance Book, 2016
  • Best Storytelling, IndieAuthors
  • Most Lovable Hero, LoveBooks
  • Best Indie Author, IndieAuthors
